TopicTitle: Game crashing while opening up save game

Articles.Content:
Hey I am having a crash when I try to enter my save games. I have done a fresh install and added my addons but still I crash while entering my save game.

 

Crash log:

 

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.6.4f1_99f88340878d]

KSP.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module KSP.exe at 0023:00fbdbff.

Error occurred at 2016-02-13_181926.
C:\Users\Luke\Desktop\KSP_win\KSP.exe, run by Luke.
87% memory in use.
0 MB physical memory [893 MB free].
0 MB paging file [0 MB free].
0 MB user address space [155 MB free].
Write to location 00000008 caused an access violation.

Context:
EDI:    0x00000008  ESI: 0x24d0deac  EAX:   0x00000008
EBX:    0x24d0dfa4  ECX: 0x24d0deac  EDX:   0xffffffff
EIP:    0x00fbdbff  EBP: 0x0042e9e0  SegCs: 0x00000023
EFlags: 0x00010202  ESP: 0x0042e9e0  SegSs: 0x0000002b

Bytes at CS:EIP:
89 10 8b 49 04 89 48 04 5d c3 cc cc cc cc cc cc

 

I don't know if I have give more of the log but If I have too I will.
